content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254452,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネット様といったな、ケイブリスと戦っていたもう片方の魔人のボスだな","translatedEnglishLine":"You mentioned Lord Hornet, right? He's the other demon boss who was fighting Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":254453,"originalJapaneseLine":"おおかた、そのホーネットを人質に取られて無理矢理戦わされているという所だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Most likely, Hornet has been taken hostage and is being forced to fight against his will."},{"lineNumber":254454,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・答えないがそれが肯定となる","translatedEnglishLine":"...No answer, but that counts as confirmation."},{"lineNumber":254455,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがかっこよくいろいろいって説得する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says various cool things to persuade."},{"lineNumber":254456,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・しかたがないと言っているだ。こうするしかないんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"...He says it can't be helped. This is the only way."},{"lineNumber":254457,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスには勝てない、ホーネット様は救えない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't win against Caveblis, and Lord Hornet can't be saved..."},{"lineNumber":254458,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうするしか、これしか・・・泣いてるシルキィ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the only way, the only choice... Silky is crying."},{"lineNumber":254459,"originalJapaneseLine":"決め台詞、俺に任せろ、可愛い子は全て幸福にしてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Catchphrase: Leave it to me, I'll make all the cute girls happy."},{"lineNumber":254460,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットちゃんも可愛いのだろ、俺が助け出してやる。おまえもだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet-chan is also cute, right? I'll rescue her. And you too."},{"lineNumber":254461,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィの回想、ガイに人類を預けろと言われたシーン　それと重なる","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky's flashback: the scene where Guy told her to entrust humanity, overlapping with this."},{"lineNumber":254462,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを殺す気力を失ったシルキィ","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky has lost the will to kill Rance."},{"lineNumber":254463,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラがシルキィの手から剣を取る、この場はこれで解決","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera takes the sword from Silky's hand; the situation is resolved for now."},{"lineNumber":254464,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍と１軍２軍の戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the battlefield between the demon army and the first and second squads."},{"lineNumber":254465,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス達は必死の防戦","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares and others are desperately defending."},{"lineNumber":254466,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ヨシフが押していた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon generalissimo Yosif was pushing forward."},{"lineNumber":254467,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに報告、シルキィ様の事が分かりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"A report arrives: we have information about Lady Silky."},{"lineNumber":254468,"originalJapaneseLine":"単身リーザス城に侵入、リーザス王を殺しに向かった模様です","translatedEnglishLine":"She apparently infiltrated Riezas Castle alone, intending to kill King Riezas."},{"lineNumber":254469,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほお・・勝手に動いたかと思ったが、そういう事が、リーザス王を殺したとは手柄だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh... I thought she acted on her own, but if that's the case—killing King Riezas is quite an achievement."},{"lineNumber":254470,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが報告無しはいかんな、戻ってきたらお仕置きだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But not reporting that is unacceptable. She'll be punished when she returns."},{"lineNumber":254471,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえそれが・・シルキィ様はそこで人間共負けて捕まったと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, actually... Lady Silky was defeated by humans there and captured..."},{"lineNumber":254472,"originalJapaneseLine":"な、なんだと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What?!"},{"lineNumber":254473,"originalJapaneseLine":"それどころか、元人間なシルキィ様はそのまま人間側に寝返り","translatedEnglishLine":"More than that, since Lady Silky was once human, she defected to the human side."},{"lineNumber":254474,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、我々に攻撃する為に向かっていると","translatedEnglishLine":"She is now heading to attack us."},{"lineNumber":254475,"originalJapaneseLine":"動揺が走る魔物大将軍の側近達、魔物将軍、魔物隊長","translatedEnglishLine":"A panic spreads among the demon general's aides, demon generals, and demon captains."},{"lineNumber":254476,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分達がさんざんシルキィにしてきた事、怖くなった、復讐される・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They are terrified of what they've done to Silky and fear revenge."},{"lineNumber":254477,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ・・とわれ先に逃げ出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahh... and they start fleeing ahead of others."},{"lineNumber":254478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ホーネットが居るのでシルキィがそういう行動は取れないが、ここでは","translatedEnglishLine":"(Since Hornet is present, Silky can't take such actions, but here..."},{"lineNumber":254479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　デマとしてそれが広がる）","translatedEnglishLine":"...this spreads as false rumors.)"},{"lineNumber":254480,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は総崩れになった","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army completely collapsed."},{"lineNumber":254481,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス軍、どういう事だ、奴らが崩れたぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares's army: What's going on? They collapsed..."},{"lineNumber":254482,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかりません、何かあったのでしょうか","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know, maybe something happened."},{"lineNumber":254483,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの崩れ方、計画的では無いな・・何かトラブルがあったのだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"That kind of collapse isn't planned... There must have been some trouble."},{"lineNumber":254484,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、そこは利用されてもらう、押し返せ、いっきに戦線を押し上げるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"But we'll take advantage of that. Push them back and advance the front line all at once."},{"lineNumber":254485,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうして、リーザス軍は逃げる魔軍を蹂躙し一時的ではあるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, the Riezas army crushed the fleeing demon army, albeit temporarily."},{"lineNumber":254486,"originalJapaneseLine":"大勝利を収めた","translatedEnglishLine":"They achieved a great victory."},{"lineNumber":254487,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":254488,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋に幽閉されているシルキィ。牢屋では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky is confined in a room. It's not a prison cell."},{"lineNumber":254489,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、ランスと話をしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is talking with Rance."},{"lineNumber":254490,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目・・私が負けて捕まったりしたらホーネット様が・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No... if I lose and get captured, Lord Hornet will be..."},{"lineNumber":254491,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットを人質にハウゼル、シルキィが戦わされていた事","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet was taken hostage, forcing Howzer and Silky to fight."},{"lineNumber":254492,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは怒っている、ランスは比較的冷静","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is angry, while Rance remains comparatively calm."},{"lineNumber":254493,"originalJapaneseLine":"囚われの魔人の姫様か・・くっくっ、俺好みのシチュエーション","translatedEnglishLine":"A captive demon princess, huh... Heh heh, my kind of situation."},{"lineNumber":254494,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、落ち着け。お前とハウゼル、両方を使う為にホーネットが使われているんだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, calm down. Hornet is being used to manipulate both you and Howzer, right?"},{"lineNumber":254495,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら殺されはしない。","translatedEnglishLine":"So they won't kill you."},{"lineNumber":254496,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだハウゼルに対して人質として意味があるからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because hostage-taking still has leverage against Howzer."},{"lineNumber":254497,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに、いつまで従っていてもいつかは殺されたかもしれないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, even if you keep obeying, you could have been killed eventually."},{"lineNumber":254498,"originalJapaneseLine":"簡単な解決方法を教えてやろう、ホーネットを救い出してケイブリスを倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me tell you a simple solution: rescue Hornet and defeat Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":254499,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理だ、我々ホーネット派が何年も戦って勝てなかったんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Impossible. We Hornet faction have fought for years and couldn't win."},{"lineNumber":254500,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは俺様がいなかったからだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's because I wasn't here."},{"lineNumber":254501,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィはここにいろ、俺に捕まっている事にすればいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky, stay here. Just pretend you're captured by me."},{"lineNumber":254502,"originalJapaneseLine":"ならケイブリス達を裏切ったという事にはなるまい","translatedEnglishLine":"That way, it won't seem like you betrayed Caveblis and the others."},{"lineNumber":254503,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、誰かとランスの話し","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, Rance talks with someone."},{"lineNumber":254504,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは襲わないのですかと誰かに聞かれるが・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone asks if he won't attack Silky, but..."},{"lineNumber":254505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふふふ、俺は大人なのだ。あのタイプは・・・ゆっくり落とす！","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh heh, I'm an adult. That type... I’ll slowly win them over!"},{"lineNumber":254506,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう見えているのだ、あの子が俺にめろめろになるのがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can already see it—how that girl will fall head over heels for me."},{"lineNumber":254507,"originalJapaneseLine":"大昔の人類の英雄か・・うむ、俺が抱くにふさわしい","translatedEnglishLine":"An ancient hero of humanity, huh... Yes, she is worthy of my affection."},{"lineNumber":254508,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ハウゼルを狙うと決める","translatedEnglishLine":"He decides to target the demon Howzer."},{"lineNumber":254509,"originalJapaneseLine":"北部の戦場に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"He heads to the northern battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254510,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックが同行する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick accompanies him."},{"lineNumber":254511,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリブ商店街の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the Liv shopping district."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット様といったな、ケイブリスと戦っていたもう片方の魔人のボスだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You mentioned Lord Hornet, right? He's the other demon boss who was fighting Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおかた、そのホーネットを人質に取られて無理矢理戦わされているという所だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most likely, Hornet has been taken hostage and is being forced to fight against his will.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・答えないがそれが肯定となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...No answer, but that counts as confirmation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがかっこよくいろいろいって説得する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says various cool things to persuade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・しかたがないと言っているだ。こうするしかないんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...He says it can't be helped. This is the only way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスには勝てない、ホーネット様は救えない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't win against Caveblis, and Lord Hornet can't be saved...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうするしか、これしか・・・泣いてるシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the only way, the only choice... Silky is crying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決め台詞、俺に任せろ、可愛い子は全て幸福にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Catchphrase: Leave it to me, I'll make all the cute girls happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットちゃんも可愛いのだろ、俺が助け出してやる。おまえもだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet-chan is also cute, right? I'll rescue her. And you too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの回想、ガイに人類を預けろと言われたシーン　それと重なる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's flashback: the scene where Guy told her to entrust humanity, overlapping with this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを殺す気力を失ったシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky has lost the will to kill Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがシルキィの手から剣を取る、この場はこれで解決
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera takes the sword from Silky's hand; the situation is resolved for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍と１軍２軍の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the battlefield between the demon army and the first and second squads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス達は必死の防戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares and others are desperately defending.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフが押していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon generalissimo Yosif was pushing forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告、シルキィ様の事が分かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report arrives: we have information about Lady Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単身リーザス城に侵入、リーザス王を殺しに向かった模様です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She apparently infiltrated Riezas Castle alone, intending to kill King Riezas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほお・・勝手に動いたかと思ったが、そういう事が、リーザス王を殺したとは手柄だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... I thought she acted on her own, but if that's the case—killing King Riezas is quite an achievement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが報告無しはいかんな、戻ってきたらお仕置きだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But not reporting that is unacceptable. She'll be punished when she returns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえそれが・・シルキィ様はそこで人間共負けて捕まったと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, actually... Lady Silky was defeated by humans there and captured...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころか、元人間なシルキィ様はそのまま人間側に寝返り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than that, since Lady Silky was once human, she defected to the human side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、我々に攻撃する為に向かっていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is now heading to attack us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動揺が走る魔物大将軍の側近達、魔物将軍、魔物隊長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A panic spreads among the demon general's aides, demon generals, and demon captains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達がさんざんシルキィにしてきた事、怖くなった、復讐される・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are terrified of what they've done to Silky and fear revenge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・とわれ先に逃げ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh... and they start fleeing ahead of others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ホーネットが居るのでシルキィがそういう行動は取れないが、ここでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Since Hornet is present, Silky can't take such actions, but here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デマとしてそれが広がる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...this spreads as false rumors.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れになった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army completely collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス軍、どういう事だ、奴らが崩れたぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares's army: What's going on? They collapsed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりません、何かあったのでしょうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, maybe something happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの崩れ方、計画的では無いな・・何かトラブルがあったのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of collapse isn't planned... There must have been some trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、そこは利用されてもらう、押し返せ、いっきに戦線を押し上げるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we'll take advantage of that. Push them back and advance the front line all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、リーザス軍は逃げる魔軍を蹂躙し一時的ではあるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the Riezas army crushed the fleeing demon army, albeit temporarily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勝利を収めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They achieved a great victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋に幽閉されているシルキィ。牢屋では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is confined in a room. It's not a prison cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、ランスと話をしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is talking with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目・・私が負けて捕まったりしたらホーネット様が・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... if I lose and get captured, Lord Hornet will be...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットを人質にハウゼル、シルキィが戦わされていた事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet was taken hostage, forcing Howzer and Silky to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは怒っている、ランスは比較的冷静
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is angry, while Rance remains comparatively calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚われの魔人の姫様か・・くっくっ、俺好みのシチュエーション
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A captive demon princess, huh... Heh heh, my kind of situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、落ち着け。お前とハウゼル、両方を使う為にホーネットが使われているんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, calm down. Hornet is being used to manipulate both you and Howzer, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら殺されはしない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they won't kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだハウゼルに対して人質として意味があるからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because hostage-taking still has leverage against Howzer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、いつまで従っていてもいつかは殺されたかもしれないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, even if you keep obeying, you could have been killed eventually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単な解決方法を教えてやろう、ホーネットを救い出してケイブリスを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me tell you a simple solution: rescue Hornet and defeat Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理だ、我々ホーネット派が何年も戦って勝てなかったんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impossible. We Hornet faction have fought for years and couldn't win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは俺様がいなかったからだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's because I wasn't here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはここにいろ、俺に捕まっている事にすればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, stay here. Just pretend you're captured by me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならケイブリス達を裏切ったという事にはなるまい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, it won't seem like you betrayed Caveblis and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、誰かとランスの話し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Rance talks with someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは襲わないのですかと誰かに聞かれるが・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone asks if he won't attack Silky, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふふ、俺は大人なのだ。あのタイプは・・・ゆっくり落とす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh heh, I'm an adult. That type... I’ll slowly win them over!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう見えているのだ、あの子が俺にめろめろになるのがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can already see it—how that girl will fall head over heels for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大昔の人類の英雄か・・うむ、俺が抱くにふさわしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An ancient hero of humanity, huh... Yes, she is worthy of my affection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルを狙うと決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He decides to target the demon Howzer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部の戦場に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He heads to the northern battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick accompanies him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リブ商店街の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Liv shopping district.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I thought she acted on her own, but if that's the case—killing King Riezas is quite an achievement."},{"lineNumber":254470,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが報告無しはいかんな、戻ってきたらお仕置きだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But not reporting that is unacceptable. She'll be punished when she returns."},{"lineNumber":254471,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえそれが・・シルキィ様はそこで人間共負けて捕まったと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, actually... Lady Silky was defeated by humans there and captured..."},{"lineNumber":254472,"originalJapaneseLine":"な、なんだと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What?!"},{"lineNumber":254473,"originalJapaneseLine":"それどころか、元人間なシルキィ様はそのまま人間側に寝返り","translatedEnglishLine":"More than that, since Lady Silky was once human, she defected to the human side."},{"lineNumber":254474,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、我々に攻撃する為に向かっていると","translatedEnglishLine":"She is now heading to attack us."},{"lineNumber":254475,"originalJapaneseLine":"動揺が走る魔物大将軍の側近達、魔物将軍、魔物隊長","translatedEnglishLine":"A panic spreads among the demon general's aides, demon generals, and demon captains."},{"lineNumber":254476,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分達がさんざんシルキィにしてきた事、怖くなった、復讐される・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They are terrified of what they've done to Silky and fear revenge."},{"lineNumber":254477,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ・・とわれ先に逃げ出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahh... and they start fleeing ahead of others."},{"lineNumber":254478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ホーネットが居るのでシルキィがそういう行動は取れないが、ここでは","translatedEnglishLine":"(Since Hornet is present, Silky can't take such actions, but here..."},{"lineNumber":254479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　デマとしてそれが広がる）","translatedEnglishLine":"...this spreads as false rumors.)"},{"lineNumber":254480,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は総崩れになった","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army completely collapsed."},{"lineNumber":254481,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス軍、どういう事だ、奴らが崩れたぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares's army: What's going on? They collapsed..."},{"lineNumber":254482,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかりません、何かあったのでしょうか","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know, maybe something happened."},{"lineNumber":254483,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの崩れ方、計画的では無いな・・何かトラブルがあったのだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"That kind of collapse isn't planned... There must have been some trouble."},{"lineNumber":254484,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、そこは利用されてもらう、押し返せ、いっきに戦線を押し上げるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"But we'll take advantage of that. Push them back and advance the front line all at once."},{"lineNumber":254485,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうして、リーザス軍は逃げる魔軍を蹂躙し一時的ではあるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, the Riezas army crushed the fleeing demon army, albeit temporarily."},{"lineNumber":254486,"originalJapaneseLine":"大勝利を収めた","translatedEnglishLine":"They achieved a great victory."},{"lineNumber":254487,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":254488,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋に幽閉されているシルキィ。牢屋では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky is confined in a room. It's not a prison cell."},{"lineNumber":254489,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、ランスと話をしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is talking with Rance."},{"lineNumber":254490,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目・・私が負けて捕まったりしたらホーネット様が・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No... if I lose and get captured, Lord Hornet will be..."},{"lineNumber":254491,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットを人質にハウゼル、シルキィが戦わされていた事","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet was taken hostage, forcing Howzer and Silky to fight."},{"lineNumber":254492,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは怒っている、ランスは比較的冷静","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is angry, while Rance remains comparatively calm."},{"lineNumber":254493,"originalJapaneseLine":"囚われの魔人の姫様か・・くっくっ、俺好みのシチュエーション","translatedEnglishLine":"A captive demon princess, huh... Heh heh, my kind of situation."},{"lineNumber":254494,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、落ち着け。お前とハウゼル、両方を使う為にホーネットが使われているんだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, calm down. Hornet is being used to manipulate both you and Howzer, right?"},{"lineNumber":254495,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら殺されはしない。","translatedEnglishLine":"So they won't kill you."},{"lineNumber":254496,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだハウゼルに対して人質として意味があるからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because hostage-taking still has leverage against Howzer."},{"lineNumber":254497,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに、いつまで従っていてもいつかは殺されたかもしれないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, even if you keep obeying, you could have been killed eventually."},{"lineNumber":254498,"originalJapaneseLine":"簡単な解決方法を教えてやろう、ホーネットを救い出してケイブリスを倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me tell you a simple solution: rescue Hornet and defeat Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":254499,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理だ、我々ホーネット派が何年も戦って勝てなかったんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Impossible. We Hornet faction have fought for years and couldn't win."},{"lineNumber":254500,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは俺様がいなかったからだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's because I wasn't here."},{"lineNumber":254501,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィはここにいろ、俺に捕まっている事にすればいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky, stay here. Just pretend you're captured by me."},{"lineNumber":254502,"originalJapaneseLine":"ならケイブリス達を裏切ったという事にはなるまい","translatedEnglishLine":"That way, it won't seem like you betrayed Caveblis and the others."},{"lineNumber":254503,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、誰かとランスの話し","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, Rance talks with someone."},{"lineNumber":254504,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは襲わないのですかと誰かに聞かれるが・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone asks if he won't attack Silky, but..."},{"lineNumber":254505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふふふ、俺は大人なのだ。あのタイプは・・・ゆっくり落とす！","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh heh, I'm an adult. That type... I’ll slowly win them over!"},{"lineNumber":254506,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう見えているのだ、あの子が俺にめろめろになるのがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can already see it—how that girl will fall head over heels for me."},{"lineNumber":254507,"originalJapaneseLine":"大昔の人類の英雄か・・うむ、俺が抱くにふさわしい","translatedEnglishLine":"An ancient hero of humanity, huh... Yes, she is worthy of my affection."},{"lineNumber":254508,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ハウゼルを狙うと決める","translatedEnglishLine":"He decides to target the demon Howzer."},{"lineNumber":254509,"originalJapaneseLine":"北部の戦場に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"He heads to the northern battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254510,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックが同行する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick accompanies him."},{"lineNumber":254511,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリブ商店街の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the Liv shopping district."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット様といったな、ケイブリスと戦っていたもう片方の魔人のボスだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You mentioned Lord Hornet, right? He's the other demon boss who was fighting Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおかた、そのホーネットを人質に取られて無理矢理戦わされているという所だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most likely, Hornet has been taken hostage and is being forced to fight against his will.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・答えないがそれが肯定となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...No answer, but that counts as confirmation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがかっこよくいろいろいって説得する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says various cool things to persuade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・しかたがないと言っているだ。こうするしかないんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...He says it can't be helped. This is the only way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスには勝てない、ホーネット様は救えない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't win against Caveblis, and Lord Hornet can't be saved...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうするしか、これしか・・・泣いてるシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the only way, the only choice... Silky is crying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決め台詞、俺に任せろ、可愛い子は全て幸福にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Catchphrase: Leave it to me, I'll make all the cute girls happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットちゃんも可愛いのだろ、俺が助け出してやる。おまえもだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet-chan is also cute, right? I'll rescue her. And you too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの回想、ガイに人類を預けろと言われたシーン　それと重なる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's flashback: the scene where Guy told her to entrust humanity, overlapping with this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを殺す気力を失ったシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky has lost the will to kill Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがシルキィの手から剣を取る、この場はこれで解決
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera takes the sword from Silky's hand; the situation is resolved for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍と１軍２軍の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the battlefield between the demon army and the first and second squads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス達は必死の防戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares and others are desperately defending.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフが押していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon generalissimo Yosif was pushing forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告、シルキィ様の事が分かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report arrives: we have information about Lady Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単身リーザス城に侵入、リーザス王を殺しに向かった模様です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She apparently infiltrated Riezas Castle alone, intending to kill King Riezas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほお・・勝手に動いたかと思ったが、そういう事が、リーザス王を殺したとは手柄だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... I thought she acted on her own, but if that's the case—killing King Riezas is quite an achievement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが報告無しはいかんな、戻ってきたらお仕置きだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But not reporting that is unacceptable. She'll be punished when she returns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえそれが・・シルキィ様はそこで人間共負けて捕まったと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, actually... Lady Silky was defeated by humans there and captured...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころか、元人間なシルキィ様はそのまま人間側に寝返り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than that, since Lady Silky was once human, she defected to the human side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、我々に攻撃する為に向かっていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is now heading to attack us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動揺が走る魔物大将軍の側近達、魔物将軍、魔物隊長
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A panic spreads among the demon general's aides, demon generals, and demon captains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達がさんざんシルキィにしてきた事、怖くなった、復讐される・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are terrified of what they've done to Silky and fear revenge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・とわれ先に逃げ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh... and they start fleeing ahead of others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ホーネットが居るのでシルキィがそういう行動は取れないが、ここでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Since Hornet is present, Silky can't take such actions, but here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デマとしてそれが広がる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...this spreads as false rumors.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れになった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army completely collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス軍、どういう事だ、奴らが崩れたぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares's army: What's going on? They collapsed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりません、何かあったのでしょうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, maybe something happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの崩れ方、計画的では無いな・・何かトラブルがあったのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of collapse isn't planned... There must have been some trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、そこは利用されてもらう、押し返せ、いっきに戦線を押し上げるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we'll take advantage of that. Push them back and advance the front line all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、リーザス軍は逃げる魔軍を蹂躙し一時的ではあるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the Riezas army crushed the fleeing demon army, albeit temporarily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勝利を収めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They achieved a great victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋に幽閉されているシルキィ。牢屋では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is confined in a room. It's not a prison cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、ランスと話をしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is talking with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目・・私が負けて捕まったりしたらホーネット様が・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... if I lose and get captured, Lord Hornet will be...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットを人質にハウゼル、シルキィが戦わされていた事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet was taken hostage, forcing Howzer and Silky to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは怒っている、ランスは比較的冷静
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is angry, while Rance remains comparatively calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚われの魔人の姫様か・・くっくっ、俺好みのシチュエーション
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A captive demon princess, huh... Heh heh, my kind of situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、落ち着け。お前とハウゼル、両方を使う為にホーネットが使われているんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, calm down. Hornet is being used to manipulate both you and Howzer, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら殺されはしない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they won't kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだハウゼルに対して人質として意味があるからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because hostage-taking still has leverage against Howzer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、いつまで従っていてもいつかは殺されたかもしれないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, even if you keep obeying, you could have been killed eventually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単な解決方法を教えてやろう、ホーネットを救い出してケイブリスを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me tell you a simple solution: rescue Hornet and defeat Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理だ、我々ホーネット派が何年も戦って勝てなかったんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impossible. We Hornet faction have fought for years and couldn't win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは俺様がいなかったからだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's because I wasn't here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはここにいろ、俺に捕まっている事にすればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, stay here. Just pretend you're captured by me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならケイブリス達を裏切ったという事にはなるまい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, it won't seem like you betrayed Caveblis and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、誰かとランスの話し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, Rance talks with someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは襲わないのですかと誰かに聞かれるが・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone asks if he won't attack Silky, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふふ、俺は大人なのだ。あのタイプは・・・ゆっくり落とす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh heh, I'm an adult. That type... I’ll slowly win them over!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう見えているのだ、あの子が俺にめろめろになるのがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can already see it—how that girl will fall head over heels for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大昔の人類の英雄か・・うむ、俺が抱くにふさわしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An ancient hero of humanity, huh... Yes, she is worthy of my affection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルを狙うと決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He decides to target the demon Howzer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部の戦場に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He heads to the northern battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick accompanies him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リブ商店街の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Liv shopping district.
